alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 16 at 3:30PM HST until February 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .A west-northwest swell has been subsiding but will continue to generate large breaking waves along most north and west facing shores of the island chain through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Surf of 6 to 8 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
